name: Federal Agriculture Act
description: This law contains everything agriculture related.

properties.Title: Land Claim Paper rebate for farmers are gatherers
properties.UserDescription: Every time a gatherer or a farmer buy a LCP paper from the Federal Government.  They get a 35 euros rebate.
